briefTitle: Open Label Safety Study of Xerese Cream in the Treatment of Recurrent Herpes Labialis in Children 6-11 Years Old
officialTitle: An Open Label Multi Center Phase III Subject/Caregiver Initiated Safety Study of Xerese(Acyclovir and Hydrocortisone)Cream 5%/1% in the Treatment of Recurrent Herpes Labialis in Children
summary: To test the safety of Xerese (acyclovir and hydrocortisone)Cream 5%/1% for the treatment of recurrent cold sores in children ages 6-11yrs after 5 days of treatment.
